description: Have you ever enjoyed Arnold®, Brownberry® or Oroweat® bread? A Thomas’® English muffin or bagel? Or perhaps snacked on a Sara Lee®, Entenmann’s® or Marinela® cake or donut? If the answer is yes, then you know Bimbo Bakeries USA! More than 20,000 associates in bakeries, sales centers, offices and on sales routes work to ensure our consumers have the freshest products at every meal. In addition to competitive pay and benefits, we provide a safe and inclusive work environment that appreciates diversity, promotes development and allows our associates to be their authentic selves. A Merchandiser is responsible for merchandising fresh bakery products in local accounts/grocery stores to ensure adequate product availability on the shelf and on displays.
responsibilities: Keep bread aisle and display locations stocked appropriately in stores. Maintain clean and organized back-room product inventory. Rotate products according to color code.

qualifications.required: 18 years of age or older, Valid driver’s license, Reliable transportation, Lift, push/pull up to 50lbs.

benefits: Competitive starting pay, Safe and inclusive work environment, Opportunities for development.
